data.message: Why do we have to use me your messenger? Why not use the older way?

replies.message: HI Christine. o	We want to make everyday messaging with the most important people in your life fast, reliable, useful and fun, and we're confident Messenger is the way to do that. We hope you’ll try it and let us know what you think. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1uFk239 -Chantal
I didnt like messanger.when i tried to get the old way back.i went to report a problem.i let them know i didnt want it and dont like it forced onto me all the time.i won.......

I'd like to point out that the new messenger is not actually convenient at all and makes things slower when messaging. Thats the point Christine is trying to make. If it made things faster and useful then we wouldn't be complaining about the messenger app. We would in fact rather give up some of the "usefulness" and "reliability" of messaging as long as we can get our old methods of messaging people back. This is why I started switching to regular texting than texting on facebook.
In fact it is a sort of debate.one begins to think when the discussion is held.
Please start listening to your users instead of doing what you think is best for everyone.  Why not make it a choice to use it or not and please us all.
Don't like massager!!
I DO NOT LIKE MESSENGER either.
We're sorry to hear that, Melba. If there's anything we can do to make your Messenger experience more enjoyable, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1zwVYj2. -Chantal
Make it a choice!  Please!
I'm not liking messenger and I love Facebook just give me and those who don't want it a choice to use it or not can you make this happen please,,,
Well that was FB. WAY OF SAYING GET LOST,
You can delete the Facebook app and log on through your browser. Then you can use messenger without having to download the messenger app.
I hate it when it updates as you can't chat with anyone and you have to reload it :(
How do you get someone back after you BLOCKED THEM? The whole thing you can't see there page and they can't see yours.
Help
Jackie, You can find block and unblock under settings under the label "block". There you can unblock someone.
I did have it but when my son showed me the fine print that nobody reads I uninstalled it. It can edit my message and/or decide not to send it at all. I don't want anybody messing with my messages

You are missing the whole point we dont want messenger at all. I deleted messenger and the facebook app thanks to your dumb changes. And maybe if you didnt force us to update personal information we'd have more privacy.
Make it a choice please!
It makes it very convenient for facebook to monitor conversations for their "experiments".
My phone has always showed me my messenger messages with out the dumb app until y'all changed it.  Now it's slow!
It is a choice. It always has been. Log on through www.facebook.com and no app needed.
I like the old way too.

"We want to make everyday messaging with the most important people in your life fast, reliable, useful and fun, and we're confident Messenger is the way to do that." 
-Be confident that most people just text those "everyday" important people and don't want another app taking space on their phones. Now everytime I get a FB message I have to look at the notification on my phone until I go to my pc and take it off. Just lame.

Why Does My Messages Keep DISAPPEARING and It Says Was deleted Because of Of Abusive Content  I Know For a FACT That Some Of Them Weren't Others I Didn't Even Get To Read Why Are YOU ALL READING MY PRIVATE MESSAGES Days After I'm Done With Them I Should Be The One Who Choses What I DELETE so Everyone Be Fore Warned Someone other than You Are READING THEM
